HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Česká pošta: 79 Kč for orders up to 2 999 Kč. DPD: 79 Kč for orders up to 2 999 Kč. PPL: 93 Kč for orders up to 2 999 Kč, 19 Kč for orders over 2 999 Kč.
HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Free for orders over 2 999 Kč (excludes PPL and bulky items).
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Usually the next working day for orders placed before the cut-off time (Česká pošta: 16:00, DPD: 18:00, PPL: 19:00).

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Free for orders over 999 Kč. Price for orders under 999 Kč is not specified.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: Free for orders over 999 Kč. Price for orders under 999 Kč is not specified.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.locations: Wide network of stores throughout the Czech Republic.

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: TSBOHEMIA.CZ offers home delivery, bulky item delivery, pickup at parcel shops/lockers, and in-store pickup. PROVIDERS: Main providers for home delivery are Česká pošta, DPD, and PPL. Parcel shop providers include DPD Pickup and PPL Parcelshop. PRICING: Home delivery is free for orders over 2,999 Kč (except for PPL, which costs 19 Kč). Pickup at parcel shops/lockers is free for orders over 999 Kč. In-store pickup is always free. Bulky item delivery has a flat fee of 199 Kč. COD surcharge is 59 Kč. NOTABLE FEATURES: The company offers next-day delivery with different cut-off times depending on the carrier (up to 19:00 with PPL). In-store pickup is available on Saturdays. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information page is well-organized with a clear summary table at the top. Detailed information for each carrier is provided in separate sections. However, some information is missing, such as the price for parcel shop/locker delivery for orders below the free shipping threshold and the specific providers for parcel lockers.
